content: Fine Gold Thread is one of the advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fine_Gold_Thread.md', within the main section titled 'Fine Gold Thread'.
The content is as follows:
Fine Gold Thread is one of the advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game.
